need a topic for serving pre-compressed content. 
Some folks say mod_negotiation is hard/overkill, and the canned rewrite/setenvif/mod_headers is probably easy to get wrong.

In 2.3.x, this probably involves more <if> and less rewrite.

One such canned config:

http://drupal.org/node/1040534

While it doesn't make 100% sense there, dropping it in mod_deflate doc is probably where people would best find it.

text: I guess if the doc ends up looking atrocious, then we should instead think about teaching mod_deflate [or a new module] how to do this stuff with a simple "PreCompressedFiles on" kind of flag and let it sort out the timing, Vary, etc.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: This looks like two separate tickets to me. Working on the first part - documenting how to do it. But it seems that the other bit - teaching mod_deflate new tricks - is a good thing too.
